CHAT.comment: SI and JO are seated on blocks. SI is in front of JO. They are playing train.

u.a: looks back at JO
trying to get his attention
kisses JO on the top of the head , leaves .
looks back at JO
stops looks back again at J
Stands up you have the same jacket as me !
runs to other side of room to get jacket
as he's running back , not in camera yet
camera moves to table where AN and CO are sitting and building
LI moves to table and dumps building toys on the table; TP walks to table
SI runs to table
as he runs to table; LI and TP leave table
runs away from table , his mother meets him as he's running and says something to him . They leave view; he says "No !"
as he picks up building toys which resemble ladders and shows them to SI
playing
gets up , walks back to "train" area
as he scuffs back to table with blocks; JO walks back and builds something
JO and SI move back toward "train" . Camera on CO playing at the table
camera moves to boys at train . They are sitting; SI in front of JO
SI takes off hat and puts in hole
taking shoes off .
SI stands up and puts hat on
SI runs off , other boys follow; they are no longer in camera; After the boys leave the camera is on AM and her mother . CO is background playing quietly; AM and her mother leave .
voices trail off talking about dinner table
